description:
With Reishiro`s Asura Machina out for repairs, the responsibility of finding and capturing Dobi Lake`s mysterious monster falls on the Third Student Council. Despite the seriousness of their task, acting president of the Science Club Shuri turns the mission into a camping trip. Reishiro forbids Tomoharu from getting close to Kanade and has his younger sister Reiko keep watch over them, but Tomoharu and Kanade spend time together. Behind everything is the chaos created by another couple...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Feeling of Losing Your Destination
行き場を無くした想い
